page.title: 10Washing clothes by C.Jackson
page.content: When she wants to wash clothes my Mum gets out a washing machine.It is called a TWINTUB WASHING MACHINE.It has two tubs,one washes and one spins.My Mum opens the washing side and puts hot water in it.Then she puts the washing (clothes) in the hot water and puts in soap powder.My Mum then switches the machine on and the machine washes the clothes.The machine is worked by electricity.When they are washed my Mum puts the clothes into the spinner.The spinner spins around very quickly and dries the clothes.My Mum takes the clothes out and puts them in a wash basket.Then she hangs them out on the washing line to finish the drying.
